General.Name: Inpro SA
General.Description: Inpro S.A. engages in the construction and sale of residential and commercial real estate premises in Poland. It develops multi-family buildings; manufactures precast and reinforced concrete, and steel products; and rents and manages properties. The company also provides plumbing and heating systems; and fit-out and construction finishing services. Inpro S.A. was founded in 1987 and is based in Gdansk, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Opata Jacka Rybinskiego 8, Gdansk, Poland, 80-320

4.Name: Mr. Lukasz  Maraszek
4.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of the Supervisory Board
